original_title: Police investigation underway as cash goes missing from Sri Lanka’s Central Bank
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka's Police has launched an investigation into the disappearance of Rs. 5 Million that was placed in the safe of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka.
Central Bank personnel had filed a complaint with the Fort Police over the missing cash.
It is reported that the Central Bank has also launched an internal investigation into the incident.
